pageProduct.name: Avene Hydrance Hydrating Emulsion Light 40ml
pageProduct.description:
Â 

General Information

Light hydrating face cream for normal to combination dehydrated sensitive skin.

Warnings

Formulated to minimize the risks of allergy. Non comedogenic. For external use only. Avoid contact with the eyes.

Common Uses

Lightweight daily moisturizer for normal to combination dehydrated sensitive skin. Provides immediate and long-lasting, intense hydration and optimum comfort. Leaves the skin supple and mattified.

Ingredients

AVENE THERMAL SPRING WATER (AVENE AQUA) ETHYLHEXYL METHOXYCINNAMATE OCTOCRYLENE BIS-ETHYLHEXYLOXYPHENOL METHOXYPHENYL TRIAZINE CYCLOMETHICONE ALUMINUM STARCH OCTENYLSUCCINATE POLYMETHYL METHACRYLATE POTASSIUM CETYL PHOSPHATE BENZOIC ACID BETA-SITOSTEROL BHT CAPRYLIC/CAPRIC TRIGLYCERIDE CARBOMER CHLORPHENESIN DISODIUM EDTA FRAGRANCE (PARFUM) GLYCERIN GLYCINE SOJA (SOYBEAN) SEED EXTRACT (GLYCINE SOJA SEED EXTRACT) HYDROGENATED COCO-GLYCERIDES LECITHIN PEG-32 PEG-400 PHENOXYETHANOL POLOXAMER 188 SODIUM CHONDROITIN SULFATE SODIUM HYDROXIDE TOCOPHERYL GLUCOSIDE XANTHAN GUM

Directions

Apply morning and/or evening onto face and neck after using Hydrance Optimale serum. During sunny weather, use Hydrance Optimale UV Light hydrating cream in the morning or apply Day Protector BB Cream on top of Hydrance Optimale Light hydrating cream.
